comment: A virus wishing for speedy recovery to another virus.
amr:
# ::snt A virus wishing for speedy recovery to another virus.
(w / wish-01
      :ARG0 (v / virus)
      :ARG1 (r / recover-01
            :ARG1 (v2 / virus
                  :mod (a / another))
            :manner (s / speedy)))

comment: Bhai ji apka number .. bhi ayega ..kaise Rohit sardhan ka ur abhi sudhir chudrika .... Allah ke ghar me der hai andher nahi...
amr:
# ::snt Bhai ji apka number .. bhi ayega ..kaise Rohit sardhan ka ur abhi sudhir chudrika .... Allah ke ghar me der hai andher nahi...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / bhai
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (n / number))
            :op2 (b2 / bhi
                  :mode expressive)
            :op3 (a2 / ayega))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 n
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Rohit"
                        :op2 "Sardhan"))
            :ARG3 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Allah")))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (g / ghar)
            :op2 (h / hai
                  :mode expressive)
            :op3 (n4 / nahi
                  :mode expressive
                  :poss (s2 / she))))

comment: Iske baad tera number hai kauvve sari gandgi saaf hone ka waqt a gaya tum sabka paap ka ghada bhar chuka

(a / and
      :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s / string-entity
                  :value "Iske")
            :ARG2 (n / number))
      :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 s
            :ARG2 n)
      :op3 (b3 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s2 / string-entity
                  :value "garvve")
            :ARG2 n)
      :op4 (b4 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s3 / string-entity
                  :value "garvve")
            :ARG2 n)
      :op5 (b5 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s4 / string-entity
                  :value "gandgi saaf hone")
            :ARG2 n)
      :op6 (b6 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (w / waqt)
            :ARG2 (h / here))
      :op7 (b7 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s5 / string-entity
                  :value "Gaya"))
      :ARG2 (h2 / here)
      :op8 (b8 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s6 / string-entity
                  :value "bhar"
                  :value "chuka")))
